pageContext.claim: “As VP, Biden wiped out the Iron Range – seven plants were idled and more than 2K workers were laid off. After I put Tariffs on foreign steel, the Iron Range came roaring back to life! If Joe gets in, the Radical Left will shut down the Iron Range FOREVER!”
pageContext.analysis: There are heated disputes over environmental issues along the Iron Range, but it’s a mistake to suggest that it was closed. It's been mined for decades. Tariffs from both President Obama and President Trump have spurred an economic recovery in the area, but experts take the positive outlook with a grain of salt given the volatility in the steel industry.
